After submitting your request, you may choose to apply for credit with Acura Financial Services. If you choose to do so, in certain instances, we may forward information regarding the status of your application to the dealer you selected to receive your price quote request. If you do not want us to forward this information on to your selected dealer, you may go directly to AcuraFinancialServices.com to apply.
